page.title: 17The Swansea Festival
page.content: {Every October Swansea is the host for {one of the largest music festivals in {Britain.} In 1984 the festival celebrated its 50th anniversary. The festival lasts for a month and includes all types of musical events, from symphony concerts to jazz and non-musical items like poetry readings and art exhibitions. The main venue is the{Brangwyn Hall with its famous murals but every year the festival seems to get bigger and bigger with more and more locations. In recent years the festival period has also included a{Fringe Festival similar to that in Edinburgh.
